SEARCH
Package sttrswing.model

Class Starbase

Object
Entity
Starbase
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasFaction, HasPosition, HasSymbol, Healable, Hittable, Positionable
public class Starbase extends Entity implements Hittable, HasFaction, Healable
Starbase is a Hittable Entity that can heal the Enterprise when it is adjacent to the Starbase in the same Quadrant.

  • Constructor Summary

    Starbase(int x, int y)
    Constructs a Starbase instance at the given coordinates.

      Return the Faction this appears to belong to.

      the Faction this appears to belong to.

    • symbol

      public String symbol()
      Handles returning a 3 character String representation of the Starbase with some implicit state communicated based on the output. i.e. if the Starbase has more than 0 energy reserves left, symbol should return [S], if it has 0 energy reserves left it should return |s|.
      Specified by:
      symbol in interface HasSymbol
      Overrides:
      symbol in class Entity
      Returns:
      a 3 character string representation of the Starbase.

    • hit

      public void hit(int damage)
      Starbase handles damage being inflicted on it and determines whether to then mark it for removal.
      Specified by:
      hit in interface Hittable
      Overrides:
      hit in class Entity
      Parameters:
      damage - - amount of damage to inflict to the energy reserves of the Starbase.

    • attemptHeal

      public void attemptHeal(Enterprise enterprise)
      Handles checking if the given Enterprise is adjacent to the Starbase, and if it is, draining its own energy reserves to give to the Enterprise.
      Parameters:
      enterprise - - The Enterprise to check against the current position of our Starbase to work out if it is adjacent, and call the Enterprises heal method if so.

    • scan

      public void scan()
      Scan this ship and reveal it's Faction.
      Overrides:
      scan in class Entity

    • heal

      public void heal(int energy)
      Replenish the starbases energy by the given amount up to it's maximum.
      Specified by:
      heal in interface Healable
      Parameters:
      energy - - the amount of energy we want the Starbase to replenish by.
